extDescription.message: This extension let you easily export your PayoneerÂ® transactions into Homemoney.ua (personal accounting service).

popup_homemoney_withdraw_account.message: Default account for Payoneer ATM withdrawal transactions

popup_homemoney_payoneer_fees_category.message: Put all payoneer fees into this category

popup_homemoney_integration_start_date.message: Mark exported all Payoneer transactions before

popup_error_payoneer_account.message: Can't find a bank account with USD currency among your accounts. Make sure you have a currency with shorthand $$ or USD attached to one of the accounts of "Bank Accounts".

popup_error_cash_account.message: Can't find any cash accounts. Make sure you have a cash account in your Homemoney.

popup_error_token.message: Can't fetch a proper API token from homemoney.

popup_error_date_format.message: Date is not valid. Please, enter the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

popup_error_global.message: Error: can't connect to the server.

payoneer_select_account.message: Select cash account and currency first

payoneer_error_no_cash_account.message: Note: you have withdrawn money in $currency$, but there are no cash accounts with USD or $currency$ balance in your Homemoney. Please, fix it in your Homemoney account and reload this page.

payoneer_error_no_cash_account2.message: Note: you have withdrawn money in $currency$, but selected account does not have a balance in such currency. You can either export it in USD, or add it to Homemoney account and reload this page.

payoneer_error_saving_transaction.message: Sorry, can't save transaction at this time, please retry in a moment.
